named-query.name: contenido.byItem
named-query.description: Return a list of contents by a defined item id
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Contenido c WHERE c.idItem = :idItem

named-query.name: entidades.byTipo
named-query.description: Return a list of entities by a type id
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Entidad e WHERE e.idTipo = :idTipo

named-query.name: calificaciones.byItem
named-query.description: Return a list of qualifications by a Item id
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Calificacion c WHERE c.idItem = :idItem

named-query.name: calificaciones.byCatalogo
named-query.description: Return a list of qualifications by a Catalog id
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Calificacion c WHERE c.idCatalogo = :idCatalogo

named-query.name: preguntas.byItem
named-query.description: Return a list of Questions by a Item id
named-query.query: SELECT q FROM Pregunta q WHERE q.idItem = :idItem

named-query.name: preguntas.byCatalogo
named-query.description: Return a list of Questions by a Catalog id
named-query.query: SELECT q FROM Pregunta q WHERE q.idCatalogo = :idCatalogo
